channel.title: Big Data on DSSG Berlin
channel.description: Recent content in Big Data on DSSG Berlin

item.title: Data Analysis for Vocational Orientation and Cancer Knowledge Management
item.description: In March 2017, the second Data Science for Social Good Berlin Data Dive took place. This time, we brought together German Cancer Society, SchulePLUS and 40 excited data scientists to take a stab at real analytical challenges the non-profits are facing. (Find the German article here) SchulePLUS is a social business that aims to help make access to education and early career opportunities equally attainable for every child, and to foster creative and practice-oriented education.
